message.body: got you a dim sum pickup if you want it
Usually i'm not picky about orders but my bike is in need of a tune up so i'm just gonna be taking orders in center city if thats ok
ok, no problem at all. thanks for letting me know
got another order for you after you finish this delivery
I think my extra battery died in the rain yesterday, ill have to charge my phone after this order
no worries, thanks for the heads up
you can't take another order right now, right?
Yea, im at 10%, im on my way to uarts where i can plug in. Or can i come in and exchange my external battery?
no one is at the office...just let me know when you're back in action
No rush, but let me know when you're back up and running. I have two short hipcity rittenhouse orders I can get you.
Great! Stand by and I'll get you something ASAP
